revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RX3042H front.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = High Performance Dual WAN Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/me-en/Networking/RX3042H/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_RX3042H |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RX3042 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = H |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Analog Devices;AD6846KB; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 200 <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29JL064H70TA100; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V561620CT-H; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8305SC; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:15:F2
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCI |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.25 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console,, RJ-45 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery |addchip = 4-ports USB 2.0 Host Controller;VIA;VT6212L;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2006 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "RX3042H" and "REV:1.01A" is silkscreened on the board.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.thg.ru/network/asus_rx3042h/index.html ''ASUS RX3042H'' on '''THG'''] (internal images) :CPU: ''Analog Devices'' AD6846KB @200MHz (Fusiv-NP)
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:ASUS RX3042H front.jpg|front File:ASUS RX3042H back.jpg|back File:ASUS RX3042H bottom.jpg|bottom File:ASUS RX3042H pcb.jpg|pcb </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]]
==See also== *[[ASUS 4G-N12 B1]] - Wireless-N300 LTE Modem Router • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/4G-N12-B1/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC1900]] - AC1900 Dual Band WiFi Range Extender • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC1900/ PPage] :AiMesh Extender for seamless mesh WiFi routers, Ethernet Backhaul *[[ASUS RT-AC2400]] - Wireless AC2400 Dual-Band Gaming Router • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC2400/ PPage] :with Parental Control, support MU-MIMO *[[ASUS RT-AX3000]] - AX3000 Dual Band WiFi 6 (802.11ax) Router • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AX3000/ PPage] :MU-MIMO, OFDMA, AiMesh, AiProtection Pro (Trend Micro) *[[ASUS RT-AX92U]] - AX6100 Tri-band WiFi 6 (802.11ax) Router • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AX92U/ PPage] :AiMesh, WTFast, AiProtection Pro, VPN, Adaptive QoS, DFS band :[https://www.asus.com/Networking/AiMesh-AX6100-WiFi-System-RT-AX92U-2-Pack/ AiMesh AX6100 WiFi 6 System] (RT-AX92U 2 Pack) - AX6100 WiFi 6 :AiProtection Pro network security powered by Trend Micro *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AC (CT8)]] - AC3000 Tri-band Whole-Home Mesh WiFi 5 System • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ZenWiFi-AC-CT8/ PPage] :3Gbps Wi-Fi, 3x SSIDs, 4x GbE ports, network security and parental controls *[[ASUS ZenWiFi AX (XT8)]] - AX6600 Tri-band Whole-Home Mesh WiFi 6 System • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/ZenWiFi-AX-XT8/ PPage] :6.6Gbps Wi-Fi, 3x SSIDs, 2.5GbE port, network security and parental controls
===Models=== *[[ASUS RX3041]] (G) • ''Broadband Router'' *[[ASUS RX3041 rev B]] • [https://www.asus.com/event/network/EOL-product/ EoL products] *[[ASUS RX3041H]] • [http://www.thg.ru/network/20051110/index.html Review] *[[ASUS RX3042H]] • [http://www.thg.ru/network/asus_rx3042h/index.html Review] *[[ASUS SL500]] • ''Internet Security Router'' • [http://www.thg.ru/network/20040612/index.html Review] *[[ASUS SL1000]] • ''Internet Security Router'' • [http://www.thg.ru/network/20040612/index.html Review] :CPU: [[Philips]] PTD2210 @133MHz (MIPS w/ IPsec) :LAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8201BL/RTL8305SB (5x FE ports) *[[ASUS SL1200]] • ''Internet Security Router'' • [https://nag.ru/files/cte/0007/863.jpg PCB] :CPU: [[Ikanos]] IKF6834 (Fusiv Vx200) :LAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8305SC
